DOC.brief_summary: Patient survey identifying key elements of patient experience and decision-making processes regarding attendance University of California, Irvine (UCI)'s Integrative Medicine Clinic.
DOC.brief_title: Complementary and Alternative Medical Trends: A Patient Survey in a University Based Clinic
DOC.detailed_description: Patient survey to determine why patients come to UCI's integrative medicine clinic, whether they would prefer we accept insurance coverage, and what therapies they are using.
DOC.criteria: Adult patients 41 years of age or older English speaking Ability to provide informed consent Patient at Gottschalk Medical Plaza Integrative Medical Clinic Ability to complete survey Patient less than 41 years of age Inability to speak English Patient unable to provide informed consent Patient not being seen at Gottschalk medical Plaza Integrative Medical Clinic Incomplete survey
